nodes.title: Understand the concept of Kanban
nodes.desc: Recognize Kanban as a visual system for managing work, emphasizing continuous improvement and delivery. [kanban.org](https://kanban.org/)

nodes.title: Learn the history of Kanban
nodes.desc: Discover how Kanban originated in the 1950s in Japan, influenced by the Toyota Production System. [wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kanban)

nodes.title: Kanban in operations
nodes.desc: Implement Kanban in operations, streamlining processes and improving efficiency. [lean.org](https://www.lean.org/)

nodes.title: Kanban in marketing
nodes.desc: Use Kanban to manage marketing workflows, prioritizing tasks and improving collaboration. [hubspot](https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/kanban-marketing)

nodes.title: Kanban tools
nodes.desc: Explore various Kanban tools, such as Trello, Asana, and Microsoft Teams, to support implementation. [capterra](https://www.capterra.com/kanban-software/)

nodes.title: Kanban metrics
nodes.desc: Track key metrics, including lead time, cycle time, and throughput, to measure Kanban effectiveness. [kanban.org](https://kanban.org/kanban-metrics)

nodes.title: Kanban case studies
nodes.desc: Study real-world examples of Kanban implementation, highlighting successes and challenges. [kanban.org](https://kanban.org/case-studies)

nodes.title: Kanban training
nodes.desc: Pursue training and certification programs to develop Kanban skills and knowledge. [kanban.org](https://kanban.org/training)

nodes.title: Kanban community
nodes.desc: Engage with the Kanban community, participating in forums, conferences, and meetups. [kanban.org](https://kanban.org/community)

nodes.title: Kanban and Agile
nodes.desc: Explore the relationship between Kanban and Agile, highlighting shared principles and differences. [agilealliance](https://www.agilealliance.org/)

nodes.title: Kanban and Lean
nodes.desc: Discuss the connection between Kanban and Lean, emphasizing the importance of continuous improvement. [lean.org](https://www.lean.org/)

nodes.title: Kanban and DevOps
nodes.desc: Investigate the intersection of Kanban and DevOps, focusing on continuous delivery and deployment. [devops.com](https://devops.com/)

nodes.title: Define the core principles
nodes.desc: Identify the four core principles of Kanban: visualize the workflow, limit work in progress, focus on flow, and continuous improvement. [kanban.org](https://kanban.org/kanban-core-principles)

nodes.title: Kanban and business
nodes.desc: Apply Kanban principles to business operations, improving efficiency and customer satisfaction. [forbes](https://www.forbes.com/)

nodes.title: Kanban and leadership
nodes.desc: Examine the role of leadership in Kanban implementation, highlighting the importance of vision and support. [hbr.org](https://hbr.org/)

nodes.title: Kanban and culture
nodes.desc: Discuss the cultural implications of Kanban, emphasizing the need for collaboration and continuous improvement. [cultureamp.com](https://www.cultureamp.com/)

nodes.title: Visualize the workflow
nodes.desc: Create a visual representation of the workflow to understand the process and identify bottlenecks. [trello](https://trello.com/)

nodes.title: Limit work in progress
nodes.desc: Establish WIP limits to control the amount of work in each stage, reducing waste and improving efficiency. [kanban.org](https://kanban.org/wip-limits)

nodes.title: Focus on flow
nodes.desc: Prioritize the smooth flow of work through the system, rather than individual tasks or projects. [lean.org](https://www.lean.org/)

nodes.title: Continuous improvement
nodes.desc: Regularly review and improve the process to increase efficiency, quality, and customer satisfaction. [agilealliance](https://www.agilealliance.org/)

nodes.title: Understand the Kanban board
nodes.desc: Learn how to create a Kanban board, including columns, cards, and WIP limits. [atlassian](https://www.atlassian.com/agile/kanban/boards)

nodes.title: Kanban vs. Scrum
nodes.desc: Compare and contrast Kanban with Scrum, highlighting the differences in approach and methodology. [scrum.org](https://www.scrum.org/)

nodes.title: Kanban in software development
nodes.desc: Apply Kanban principles to software development, focusing on continuous delivery and improvement. [martinfowler](https://martinfowler.com/bliki/Kanban.html)
